Posted By: Missile_Penguin (3/11/2012 3:12:33 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I would play this alongside [Priest of Urabrask](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Priest of Urabrask), [Geosurge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Geosurge), *and* [Ball Lightning](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ball Lightning). Maybe also [Seething Song](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Seething Song) and [Elemental Appeal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elemental Appeal), just for the lulz.  
  
[Coal Stoker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Coal Stoker) is also good with [Minion Reflector](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Minion Reflector). Why yes, I'd love a better-than-free copy. Why not make that deck with [Parallel Lives](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Parallel Lives), [Doubling Season](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doubling Season), and/or [Dual Nature](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dual Nature) just for really awkward mana-ramp?  
  
@Capt13:  
If a card says "Add {MANA} to your mana pool," that mana only lasts until the next time your pool empties (probably at the end of the phase), *unless it specifies otherwise* (e.g. [Sakiko, Mother of Summer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sakiko, Mother of Summer)). It is ***NOT*** like you get to search for three [Mountain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mountain)s and put them into play.
posts.html:
I would play this alongside Priest of Urabrask, Geosurge, and Ball Lightning. Maybe also Seething Song and Elemental Appeal, just for the lulz.

Coal Stoker is also good with Minion Reflector. Why yes, I'd love a better-than-free copy. Why not make that deck with Parallel Lives, Doubling Season, and/or Dual Nature just for really awkward mana-ramp?

@Capt13:
If a card says "Add {MANA} to your mana pool," that mana only lasts until the next time your pool empties (probably at the end of the phase), unless it specifies otherwise (e.g. Sakiko, Mother of Summer). It is NOT like you get to search for three Mountains and put them into play.

Posted By: Shadoflaam (9/4/2011 10:12:42 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Seems to have been tricky to use in TIme Spiral, because if you didn't have another spell for it to fuel it would hit you for 3. A [Firebreathing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Firebreathing) ability like [Char-Rumbler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Char-Rumbler)'s would work.
  
Now that we don't have Mana burn anymore, I'm quite happy to abuse this on my elemental deck with [Brighthearth Banneret](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brighthearth Banneret), which makes it practically free, allowing me to do stuff like playing 3 of them followed by a [Chandra's Spitfire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chandra's Spitfire) on turn 3.
posts.html:
Seems to have been tricky to use in TIme Spiral, because if you didn't have another spell for it to fuel it would hit you for 3. A Firebreathing ability like Char-Rumbler's would work.
Now that we don't have Mana burn anymore, I'm quite happy to abuse this on my elemental deck with Brighthearth Banneret, which makes it practically free, allowing me to do stuff like playing 3 of them followed by a Chandra's Spitfire on turn 3.
